title: Online Business Models for Residual Income
headline: This free online course provides realistic models for building your own online residual income business.
description: Do you want to learn why money flows to a few people while others are stuck in dead-end jobs? Are you tired of working for other people and living paycheck to paycheck? This free online course is an exciting introductory guide to help you understand different types of residual income models. We will present sustainable online income strategies, including the platforms to use to launch your own residual income business. Enrol in the course now!

courseDescription:
Do you want to start your own online residual income business? Do you wish to retire early and live financially free on your own terms? In this short course, you will learn how to leverage the internet to build an online business that will earn you money even while you sleep. You will also learn how to exchange your spare time for money. We will start by considering three powerful rules for creating wealth: the law of critical mass, the ‘snowball effect’ and the law of diligence.

Next, we will highlight the difference between the traditional and digital models for building residual income. We will compare the drawbacks of the conventional models of residual income and the benefits of the digital models. Learn how to shun the theory of modern consumerism and instead develop a residual income growth plan that can help you create exponential profits in your business. To help you achieve this, we provide a spreadsheet template that you can replicate to skyrocket your residual income to $6 million or more in five years.

Furthermore, we will identify the characteristics, technical skills and top strategies required by platform builders, content builders and super builders - the three models of digital residual income. Consequently, we will teach you two affiliate marketing models, two pricing models and the ‘1-3-10’ basic copywriting rule to help you bolster your confidence. By taking this course, you will identify the best online residual income model you can use to attain financial freedom for life. So why wait? Start your learning adventure today!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.description: In this module, we will examine three types of digital residual income creators and the advantages of building an online residual income. Learn how to create exponential increases in your profit with the residual income growth plan. Then, we will present the strategies and skillset requirements for building your own online residual income business.
